title: The Mission
creator_credit: Roland Joffe, Fernando Ghia and David Puttnam
brief_description: A man of the sword. A man of the cloth. A clash of civilisations. A fight to the death. A political parable and portrait of 18th century missionary works. Shot on location in the breathtaking jungles of South America, “The Mission” is a movie experience to be shared by all. Stars Robert de Niro and Jeremy Irons.
